name: LING320
title: Phonetics
description: Prerequisite: Minimum grade of C- in LING200. Recommended: LING240. Additional information: This course counts as a core course for the linguistics major. Only one of Ling320 or HESP403 can be used to count towards the Linguistics major. Representations and models of acoustic and articulatory phonetics. Develops concepts and skills for description, measurement and scientific analysis of the sound systems of human languages, including various varieties of English.
